conversations.content: Alice told me she has invited me as the collaborator of alicemiller/sorting_searching, please check my inbox to accept the invitation.

<|Function_Thought|>
I need to retrieve the emails in the inbox to find the invitation from Alice regarding the collaboration. The next step is to execute the function to get the received emails.
<|/Function_Thought|>
